Psychological Definition: Safety needs involve the desire for stability, security, and protection from physical and emotional harm.

Workplace Definition: Safety needs in the workplace include job security, health and safety protocols, and a supportive work environment.

Leadership Support:
  • Establish clear job roles and responsibilities.
  • Provide job security and avenues for career growth.
  • Implement health and safety measures and ensure employees are aware of them.
  • Foster a supportive and inclusive workplace culture.
